forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunderstorms possible...mainly in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm this evening, then some lingering showers still possible overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
